source.name: Q2
source.instructions:
You are told that when the StatefulSet has been deployed for the first time, for some reason, readiness probes of pod `mysql-1` were failed. 

Choose the correct statement(s) regarding the [Pod status](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-phase) and [Pod condition](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-conditions) of `mysql-0` and `mysql-2`:

answers.answer: Pod `mysql-2` status is Unknown and the Initialized condition is met.
Pod `mysql-0` status is Running and the Ready condition is met.
Pod `mysql-0` status is Terminating and the Ready condition is met.
